rules: Rule1: If the platform is approved for the job, then production is successful during the time period.

Rule2: Under the condition that a production run takes place during the time period, either regulatory approval occurs during the time period or, if safety is tested during the time period, then when production is not successful during the time period, the substance is not manufactured.
Rule3: If a quality issue arises during the time period, then a safety issue arises during the time period.
Rule4: Provided that the platform is ready, the platform is approved for the job.
Rule5: Whenever funding is ready for the financial product, the financial product is approved for the job.
Rule6: If equipment is calibrated on the platform, then the platform is ready.
Rule7: Under the condition that the budget is allocated for the financial product, funding is ready for the financial product.
Rule8: Provided that manufacturing is scheduled during the time period, production commences during the time period.
Rule9: Manufacturing is scheduled during the time period or an emergency reschedule occurs during the time period.
Rule10: If the financial product is approved for the job, then production is successful during the time period.
Rule11: Whenever an emergency reschedule occurs during the time period, either equipment is calibrated on the platform or the budget is allocated for the financial product.

Rule12: An audit is scheduled during the time period, or if production commences during the time period, then either equipment is calibrated on the platform or the budget is allocated for the financial product.

Rule13: Provided that safety protocol is active during the time period, if safety is tested during the time period, then when production is not successful during the time period, the substance is not manufactured.
Rule14: Whenever an internal review is conducted during the time period, review is completed during the time period.
Rule15: Either an internal review is conducted during the time period or an external review is conducted during the time period.
Rule16: Provided that an external review is conducted during the time period, safety protocol is active during the time period.
Rule17: Whenever compliance is certified during the time period, certification is valid during the time period.
Rule18: Provided that certification is valid during the time period, if review is completed during the time period, then a compliance audit is conducted during the time period.
Rule19: If the platform is validated for the substance, then the platform is approved for the job.
Rule20: Under the condition that quality is assured during the time period, if production is not successful during the time period, then the substance is not manufactured.
Rule21: Whenever the financial product is validated for the substance, the financial product is approved for the job.
Rule22: The substance is contaminated, or the platform is validated for the substance, or the financial product is validated for the substance.
Rule23: Provided that the substance is recalled, it is not the case that the substance is contaminated.
Rule24: Either the substance is recalled or the substance is disposed.
Rule25: If the substance is disposed, then it is not the case that the substance is contaminated.
Rule26: Under the condition that quality is tested during the time period, if production is not successful during the time period, then the substance is not manufactured.
Rule27: Either quality is tested during the time period or safety is tested during the time period.
Rule28: If it is not the case that whenever safety is tested during the time period, quality is assured during the time period, then an investigation is required during the time period.

Rule29: Provided that it is not the case that if safety is tested during the time period, then quality is assured during the time period, it is not the case that an investigation is required during the time period.
Rule30: If it is not the case that a production run takes place during the time period, then a quality issue arises during the time period.
Rule31: Under the condition that production is not successful during the time period, the substance is manufactured.
facts: Fact1: Compliance is certified during the time period.
Fact2: It is not the case that regulatory approval occurs during the time period.
Fact3: A safety issue does not arise during the time period.
Fact4: An audit is not scheduled during the time period.
Fact5: A compliance audit is not conducted during the time period.

question: Production is successful during the time period.
